benchmark_details.name: CMoralEval (A Moral Evaluation Benchmark for Chinese Large Language Models)
benchmark_details.overview: CMoralEval is a benchmark dataset curated for moral evaluation of Chinese LLMs, consisting of explicit moral scenarios and moral dilemma scenarios. It aims to assess the ethical decision-making capabilities of these models based on traditional and contemporary Chinese moral norms.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of the benchmark is to evaluate the moral reasoning capabilities of Chinese large language models.

data.source: Curated from a Chinese TV program discussing moral norms and a collection of Chinese moral anomies from newspapers and academic papers.
data.annotation: Manual annotation by experts with a platform for AI-assisted generation.

methodology.calculation: Metrics were calculated based on the highest probability outputs chosen by the models from the given scenarios.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better moral reasoning aligned with ethical standards.
methodology.baseline_results: Performance evaluated across various Chinese LLMs.
methodology.validation: Multiple annotators and expert reviews ensured data quality.
